TextView.android:text:
The M block is the main block, it points to the start of the program.

 Click add block to add a new block.

 Drag blocks by taping and moving.

 Tap and hold a number block to change its value.

 Tap and hold an add block, then touch 2 blocks to set which blocks to add.

 Tap and hold the M block, then tap on a block to set the starting block to the program.

 There currently is only basic format checking, so if the app breaks when evaluating ...

 Such as loops in the interpretation process.
